name: @profplum700/etsy-v3-api-client
description: JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Etsy Open API v3 with OAuth 2.0 authentication

scripts.build: pnpm run build:core && pnpm run build:packages
scripts.type-check: pnpm run build && tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter './packages/*' run type-check
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && pnpm --filter './packages/*' exec rm -rf dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && pnpm run test
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run version:patch && pnpm run version:commit && pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm publish -r --filter . --filter './packages/*' --access public
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run version:minor && pnpm run version:commit && pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm publish -r --filter . --filter './packages/*' --access public
scripts.release:major: pnpm run version:major && pnpm run version:commit && pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm publish -r --filter . --filter './packages/*' --access public
scripts.release:patch:dry: pnpm run version:patch && pnpm run version:commit && pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm publish -r --filter . --filter './packages/*' --access public --dry-run
scripts.release:minor:dry: pnpm run version:minor && pnpm run version:commit && pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm publish -r --filter . --filter './packages/*' --access public --dry-run
scripts.release:major:dry: pnpm run version:major && pnpm run version:commit && pnpm run build && pnpm run test && pnpm publish -r --filter . --filter './packages/*' --access public --dry-run
